items.title: delibird activities

items.content_text:
remember to thank your postal workers. and give them one pillion dollars

“A timid deliverybird.
When problems arise, she scrambles to resolve them ASAP. Unfortunately, that sometimes leads to further problems.”

character theme:
♪ Rival Challenge! (Puyo Puyo!! 20th Anniversary)

items.title: vice

items.content_text:
king is asked about his armor

transcription without the funny archaic letters:
“Nay, this fine suit of armor hath been my sole abode since afore mine earliest memories.
Upon my wake in this new body, it brought me severe dolor.
Now, such time has passed that I'd nary dream of inhabiting any other!”
items.content_html:
king is asked about his armor
